queries.query:
from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lux")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "irrigation_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "waterCost")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lux")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "moistureSensorValue")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pir")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "moistureSensorValue")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pir")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "irrigation_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "relayState")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "IoT")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "irrigation_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weather_forecast")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
